item.title: Gobgp使用
item.description: 安装环境 1 2 curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh sh get-docker.sh 1 wget https://github.com/osrg/gobgp/releases/download/v3.16.0/gobgp_3.16.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz 对于主机A: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 [global.config] as = 65001 router-id = "192.168.50.116" [[neighbors]] [neighbors.config] neighbor-address = "192.168.50.199" peer-as = 65002 对于主机B: 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 [global.config] as = 65002 router-id = "192.168.50.199" [[neighbors]] [neighbors.config] neighbor-address =
